title: Build GenAI Applications with Cassandra, AWS & Langflow
description:
Want to learn to use Langflow with your existing Apache Cassandra® project? Join Aaron Ploetz for a live session to walk you through building Langflow RAG projects with Amazon Bedrock and Apache Cassandra®.

If you’re already working with Cassandra and your organization is interested in building Generative AI applications, this session is for you! This hands-on webinar is designed for developers, architects, and tech professionals who want to unlock the full potential of their self-managed Apache Cassandra® deployments.

Here’s what you’ll take away:

--Learn with Langflow: One of the hottest AI developer technologies on the market.
--Build in your AWS cloud: This session will utilize AWS services like ECS, EKS, and Bedrock.
--Run on Cassandra: See how to utilize Apache Cassandra® as a vector store.

LIVESTREAM RESOURCES:
DataStax Discord: https://dtsx.io/4giZIP5
Modernize Cassandra Workloads: https://dtsx.io/42AZIXh 
JVector GitHub: https://dtsx.io/40yl316

Additional Resources:
- DataStax Developer Hub: https://dtsx.io/devhub
- DataStax Blog: https://dtsx.io/howto
- Try Langflow: https://dtsx.io/trylangflow
- Try Astra DB: https://dtsx.io/40kQpI6
____________________

Stay in touch:
- Join our Discord Community: https://discord.gg/datastax
- Follow us on X: https://x.com/DataStaxDevs
